channel.title: Apis on Malice Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Apis on Malice Docs

item.title: API
item.description: The Malice HTTP API gives you full access to Malice via HTTP. Every aspect of Malice can be controlled via this API. The Malice CLI uses the HTTP API to access Malice. Version Prefix All API routes are prefixed with /v1/. This documentation is only for the v1 API. Transport The API is expected to be accessed over a TLS connection at all times, with a valid certificate that is verified by a well behaved client.
